jobDescription: OverviewIn partnership with NYC Health + Hospitals/Metropolitan our teams provide care for over 313,000 outpatient visits, nearly 70,000 emergency room visits and more than 13,000 inpatient admissions annually. The hospital maintains an academic affiliation with New York Medical College. The Department of Dental Medicine is comprised of Divisions of General Dental Practice and Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery. The department is located on the 2nd floor of the Ambulatory Care Pavilion of the Hospital and consists of departmental offices, 10 state of the art operatories, a surgical suite with recovery room, a reception area, waiting room, conference room, intra and extra oral Digital Radiography. In addition, an online computer network capable of accessing NYMC, the National Library of Medicine and the internet is within the Department. The New York Medical College Manhattan campus at Metropolitan Hospital is one of four videoconference sites used by the Department of Dental Medicine.ResponsibilitiesWe are currently seeking a per diem Orthodontist to manage ortho patients in preparation for orthognathic surgeryQualifications New York State license to practice dentistryFormal training in orthodonticsBE/BC in orthodonticsD.D.S or D.M.D degreeStrong teaching and supervisory skills
